text: 13:35 Onger Akaba 118:26; Aisaia 1:7; Jeremaia 22:5; Maika 3:12; Matyu 21:9; Mak 11:9-10; Jon 12:13Ia oragh! Ian nguibam, God anetaki, ezɨ a nguibar soriam gava. Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, ia ua nan ganan kogh, kamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ dughiar ia suam, ‘Gumazir, Ekiamɨn ziam ko gavgavimɨn izim, God deragh a damu!’ ”
